title: NCAA: Judiel Nitura-led Letran stays perfect with rout of San Sebastian
desc: Judiel Nitura shone from start to finish to help Colegio de San Juan de Letran dominate San Sebastian College-Recoletos, 26-24, 25-22, 25-17, and remain unscathed in NCAA Season 101 women's volleyball.

title: Feng Shui artist ushers in Year of the Fire Horse with solo exhibit
desc: A recognized Feng Shui artist, Uychaco produces artworks that stand out for their authenticity — rooted in her Chinese-Filipino heritage and brought to life through a masterful use of mixed media.

title: The Accra Reset Initiative: Reaffirming Ghana’s Leadership and Africa’s Agency in a Changing World.
desc: The Accra Reset Initiative, championed by the President of the Republic of Ghana, John Dramani Mahama, stands as a timely and profound statement of renewal, one that speaks not only to Ghana’s national aspirations but also to Africa’s collective future.

title: Iran open to compromises to reach nuclear deal with U.S.: BBC
desc: Iran has said it is prepared to discuss curbs on its nuclear program in return for the lifting of sanctions.

title: 'If he takes over, the better for everybody' - Speaker Bagbin endorses Bernard Ahiafor
desc: The Speaker of Parliament, Alban Bagbin, has expressed strong confidence in his First Deputy Speaker, Bernard Ahiafor, stating that the country and Parliament would greatly benefit if he succeeds him in office.
